name: MK Different Publisher
author: Moritz Kanzler

sections.description: This project has a repository at github: https://github.com/Mo0812/mk-different-publisher
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mk-different-publisher directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->Publish screen to configure the plugin in the sections below.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mk-different-publisher directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->Publish screen to configure the plugin in the sections below.

I have questions or want to report a possible bug?!

Open an issue in github!

short_description: This WordPress Plugin prevent backend user to publish their own posts, even if they have granted the rights to publish posts in general.
description: This project has a repository at github: https://github.com/Mo0812/mk-different-publisher
